entities.name: NVIDIA
entities.description: NVIDIA is a technology company whose common stock is traded on the Nasdaq Global Select Market under the symbol NVDA. NVIDIA has a share repurchase program and pays quarterly cash dividends.

entities.name: NASDAQ GLOBAL SELECT MARKET
entities.description: The Nasdaq Global Select Market is a stock market where NVIDIA's common stock is traded under the symbol NVDA.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA's common stock is traded on the Nasdaq Global Select Market.
